message.content:
{"id": "35156", "title": "Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 does not work on some fields in the help search", 
"description": "When launching Eclipse with DBCS locale and selecting 'Search Help' from the menu bar, pressing Ctrl+F1 on the first text field does not display the help pop-up screen as expected. This issue occurs on all DBCS languages and is specific to the first text field. Cycling through the other fields using the tab key correctly displays the relevant text on pressing Ctrl+F1. The attached screenshot highlights the field that is not responding to Ctrl+F1 (circled in red), while the fields circled in green work properly.", 
"OB": "Pressing Ctrl+F1 on the first text field in the help search should display a help pop-up screen with information about the Help Search.", 
"EB": "Pressing Ctrl+F1 on the first text field in the help search results in no action or response.", 
"SR": "To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Launch Eclipse with DBCS locale.
2. Select 'Search Help' from the menu bar.
3. When the search window appears, click on the first text field.
4. Press Ctrl+F1.

Expected Result: A help pop-up screen should appear displaying information about the Help Search.

Actual Result: Nothing happens."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
